Detailed Description

This class handles all dynamic (i.e.

not part of the map grid) objects during gameplay.

Member Data Documentation

gameobjectmanager.GameObjectManager.objectTree

QuadTree that holds all dynamic objects.

Delay instantiating this until the game map is ready.
